name: transient-value-trimmer
description: Allows to catch the 'permanent' value of something after a specified delay avoiding undesired transient changes.
author: hjcostabr76 <hjcosta.dev@gmail.com>

scripts.test: echo "Error: So far, not good... There ain't no tests yet :(" && exit 1
